mapper.select: SELECT SUM(qty) qty, SUM(amt) amt, SUM(afterAmt) afterAmt FROM ( SELECT bs.cLitCls_c categoryId, bs.cLitCls_N categoryN, SUM(nQty) qty, SUM(nAmt) amt, SUM(nAmt) - SUM(bs.nDisAmt) afterAmt, cBranch_C shopC, cBranch_N shopN FROM ${com}.d_t_food_bills bs LEFT JOIN ${com}.d_t_food_bill b ON b.CBILL_C = bs.CBILL_C WHERE DBUSINESS >= #{startDate} AND DBUSINESS <= #{endDate} AND b.CBRANCH_C LIKE #{shopC} AND bs.cLitCls_c IS NOT NULL AND bs.cLitCls_N <> '套餐' GROUP BY bs.cLitCls_c , bs.cLitCls_N , b.cBranch_C, b.cBranch_N ) t
